name: Supernova TD
description:
The star in your home system has gone supernova. You must lead a caravan of what's left of your race and culture to safety through hostile alien territory. Explore new worlds, collect blueprints to build towers that will protect your civilization, upgrade your ship's systems and towers to survive and find a new settlement.

Key Features

  • Permadeath - You've got one chance to lead your people to safety. One wrong move and your civilization will be lost forever.
  • Procedurally Generated Levels & Loot - No two playthroughs will be exactly the same. The enemies you face and the items you receive will vary with each encounter.
  • Upgrade Your Towers & Ship - The Blueprints you receive that allow you to build towers can be upgraded! Each upgrade increases the stats of the tower, key threshold upgrades will change and enhance the functionality. Your ship's stations can also be upgraded to provide benefits during combat and when crafting.
  • Compete on the Leaderboard - At the beginning of each level you're able to choose the difficulty modifiers for that round. Facing and prevailing against more difficult enemies will result in a higher score to put you on top of the leaderboard! However, don't bite off more than you can chew!
